generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Entity Drink Milk Behavior

fields.title: Cooldown Seconds
fields.description: Time (in seconds) that the goal is on cooldown before it can be used again. Default value: 5.
Conditions that need to be met for the behavior to start.
